医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究强调 RSV 疫苗接种对高危人群的重要性自去年推出以来，研究人员一直在监测新型呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗对现实世界的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Study-highlights-importance-of-RSV-vaccination-for-high-risk-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Study-highlights-importance-of-RSV-vaccination-for-high-risk-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc1d2ce1-bcd9-48f6-a44a-df0f3882c84c Mon, 28 Oct 2024 21:06:56 -0400 Study highlights importance of RSV vaccination for high-risk populations
线虫模型系统加速淀粉样蛋白抑制剂的发现由多伦多大学研究人员领导的一个国际团队开发了一种高效而强大的系统，利用秀丽隐杆线虫线虫来筛选可以阻止淀粉样蛋白生长的化合物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/C-elegans-model-system-accelerates-discovery-of-amyloid-inhibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/C-elegans-model-system-accelerates-discovery-of-amyloid-inhibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3878f7f-8616-4cad-8bde-127d9062b896 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:59:59 -0400 C. elegans model system accelerates discovery of amyloid inhibitors
基因组技术用于增进对 Marjolin 溃疡的了解研究人员利用卡尔加里大学的专门基因组技术来加深我们对马乔林溃疡 (MU) 的了解，这是一种罕见的、高度侵袭性的皮肤癌，会影响慢性伤口，这些伤口通常是由严重烧伤造成的疤痕引起的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Genomic-technology-used-to-improve-understanding-of-Marjolins-ulcer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Genomic-technology-used-to-improve-understanding-of-Marjolins-ulcer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2f4a321-4aea-4f72-a472-593d438a3069 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:55:34 -0400 Genomic technology used to improve understanding of Marjolin's ulcer
新的遗传见解揭示了西非人的肾脏疾病风险美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员及其合作者的一项研究揭示了加纳和尼日利亚人群肾病的一个重要遗传风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-genic-insights-reveal-kidney-disease-risk-in-West-Africans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-genic-insights-reveal-kidney-disease-risk-in-West-Africans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38633cc2-6dca-4aa5-b350-01a1aa52c410 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:51:27 -0400 New genetic insights reveal kidney disease risk in West Africans
纽约大学朗格健康中心为心脏病发作存活率设定基准根据医疗保险和医疗补助服务中心 (CMS) 的最新数据，纽约大学朗格健康中心的心脏病死亡率全国最低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/NYU-Langone-Health-sets-benchmark-for-heart-attack-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/NYU-Langone-Health-sets-benchmark-for-heart-attack-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b38f599c-ce19-4a17-84a4-24e2a6ff7584 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:45:36 -0400 NYU Langone Health sets benchmark for heart attack survival rates
新型加密肽为对抗耐药细菌带来了希望在对抗抗生素耐药性细菌日益增长的威胁方面取得了重大进展，研究人员发现了一类新型抗菌剂，称为加密肽，它可能会扩大免疫系统对抗感染的工具库。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Novel-class-of-encrypted-peptides-offers-hope-against-drug-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Novel-class-of-encrypted-peptides-offers-hope-against-drug-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=919bc77d-845f-44a0-b579-80eec9d8a318 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:43:02 -0400 Novel class of encrypted peptides offers hope against drug-resistant bacteria
全球领导人齐聚 NFCR 峰会，推动癌症治疗突破与AIM-HI加速器基金共同主办的2024年国家癌症研究基金会（NFCR）全球峰会暨癌症研究创业颁奖典礼，汇聚了癌症研究、生物科技创业、医药、投资、患者等领域的全球顶尖专家倡导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Global-leaders-gather-at-the-NFCR-Summit-to-drive-breakthroughs-in-cancer-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Global-leaders-gather-at-the-NFCR-Summit-to-drive-breakthroughs-in-cancer-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ad3d80e-a6d8-4e1e-8f03-54d0bb09fd05 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:35:43 -0400 Global leaders gather at the NFCR Summit to drive breakthroughs in cancer care
大麻合法化与青少年使用大麻的增加有关爱思唯尔发表在《美国儿童和青少年精神病学学会杂志》(JAACAP) 上的一项研究报告称，美国各州休闲大麻合法化导致过去一个月青少年和青少年吸食大麻的可能性增加。年轻人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Legalization-of-cannabis- Associated-with-rising-use-among-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Legalization-of-cannabis- Associated-with-rising-use-among-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd38a84f-2ac4-467f-84a3-4e206ce31869 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:27:16 -0400 Legalization of cannabis associated with rising use among adolescents
NIH 拨款 260 万美元探索高血压药物对 CKD 患者的影响美国国立卫生研究院向凯斯西储大学的研究人员提供了为期四年、价值 260 万美元的资助，用于研究高血压药物如何影响慢性肾病 (CKD) 患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/NIH-grants-2426-million-to-explore-the-effects-of-high-blood-Pressure-drugs-in-CKD-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/NIH-grants-2426-million-to-explore-the-effects-of-high-blood-Pressure-drugs-in-CKD-患者.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=229f4183-657b-421c-b8c0-70e3fd0330a2 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:22:46 -0400 NIH grants $2.6 million to explore the effects of high blood-pressure drugs in CKD patients
研究人员发现亨廷顿病发展的关键生化机制牛津大学的研究人员已经确定了与亨廷顿舞蹈病发展相关的关键生化机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Researchers-discover-key-biochemical-mechanism-in-Huntingtons-disease-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Researchers-discover-key-biochemical-mechanism-in-Huntingtons-disease-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=430773d7-b717-4689-a6a6-83ea0b7c44b7 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 20:18:18 -0400 Researchers discover key biochemical mechanism in Huntington's disease development
